import java.util.*;
public class Eating_Candies
{
    public static void main(String Args[])
    {
        Scanner obj = new Scanner(System.in);
        int t = obj.nextInt();
        while (t > 0)
        {
            t--;
            int n = obj.nextInt();
            int arr[] = new int[n];
            int i = 0, j = n;
            long lsum = 0, rsum = 0;
            for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
            {
                arr[i] = obj.nextInt();
            }
            i = -1;
            j = n;
            while (i < j)
            {
                if (lsum == rsum)
                {
                    c = i + 1 + n - j;
                    i++;
                    j--;
                    lsum = lsum + arr[i];
                    rsum = rsum + arr[j];
                }
                else if (lsum < rsum)
                {
                    i++;
                    lsum += arr[i];
                }
                else
                {
                    j--;
                    rsum = rsum + arr[j];
                }
            }
            System.out.println(c);
        }
    }
}
